text: Jorge Amaya (born 31 July 1934) is an Argentine equestrian. He competed in the individual jumping event at the 1968 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:Argentine male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Argentina Category:Equestrians at the 1968 Summer Olympics Category:Pan American Games medalists in equestrian Category:Pan American Games silver medalists for Argentina Category:Equestrians at the 1963 Pan American Games Category:Sportspeople from Buenos Aires
title: Jorge Amaya
